name: Attack of the Arcons
description:
Our character Yaroslav is a human who lives on Earth in the future. Hostile insect-like aliens called Arcons strike an attack on Earth in an attempt to conquer it. Yaroslav and his fellow troup are sent to the Arcon’s homeworld, Creovis, where Yaroslav must destroy the Emperor Arcon in order to save humanity.  

Controls:

  • Arrow Buttons to move (Left Arrow: Move Left, Right Arrow: Move Right, Up Arrow: Jump)
  • Space Button to shoot gun

How to Play:

  • Move forward through maps and defeat enemies.
  • Enemies have their health above their head, the health is the number of projectiles it takes to kill it.
  • Player has three lives before respawning. Respawn checkpoints are at the beginning of each map/level.
